00001 #ifndef nrnhash_h
00002 #define nrnhash_h
00003 // hash table where buckets are binary search maps and key is castable to unsigned long
00004 
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 #include <vector>
00007 #include <map>
00008 
00009 
00010 #define __NrnHashEntry(Table) Table##_Entry
00011 #define NrnHashEntry(Table) __NrnHashEntry(Table)
00012 #define __NrnHashLT(Table) nrnhash_lt_##Table
00013 #define NrnHashLT(Table) __NrnHashLT(Table)
00014 
00015 // note that more recent STL versions (But not gcc2.95) supply
00016 // at(long) to get the vector element. My version contains some
00017 // confusion with regard to how to handle issues involving const
00018 // in this classes implementation of the find method.
00019 // [] creates key value association if does not exist
00020 
00021 #define declareNrnHash(Table,Key,Value) \
00022     struct NrnHashLT(Table) { \
00023         int operator() (Key i, Key j) const { \
00024             return ((unsigned long)i) < ((unsigned long)j); \
00025         } \
00026     }; \
00027     \
00028     class NrnHashEntry(Table) : public std::map <Key, Value, NrnHashLT(Table)>{}; \
00029     \
00030     class Table : public vector<NrnHashEntry(Table)> { \
00031     public: \
00032         Table(long size); \
00033         virtual ~Table(); \
00034         bool find(Key, Value&)const; \
00035         NrnHashEntry(Table)& at(unsigned long bucket){ return *(begin() + bucket); } \
00036         Value& operator[](Key key) { return at(hash(key))[key]; } \
00037         unsigned long hash(Key key)const { return ((unsigned long)key)%size_; } \
00038         long size_; \
00039     };
00040 
00041 #define implementNrnHash(Table,Key,Value) \
00042     Table::Table(long size) { \
00043         resize(size+1); \
00044         size_ = size; \
00045     } \
00046     \
00047     Table::~Table() {} \
00048     \
00049     bool Table::find(Key key, Value& ps)const { \
00050         NrnHashEntry(Table)::const_iterator itr; \
00051         const NrnHashEntry(Table)& gm = ((Table*)this)->at(hash(key)); \
00052         if ((itr = gm.find(key)) == gm.end()) { \
00053             return false; \
00054         } \
00055         ps = itr->second; \
00056         return true; \
00057     }
00058 
00059 // for iteration, if you have
00060 // declareNrnHash(Table,Key,Object)
00061 // Table* table;
00062 // then you can iterate with
00063 #define NrnHashIterate(Table,table,Value,value) \
00064     if (table) for (long i__ = table->size_ - 1; i__ >= 0; --i__) { \
00065             NrnHashEntry(Table)::const_iterator p__ = table->at(i__).begin(); \
00066             NrnHashEntry(Table)::const_iterator pe__ = table->at(i__).end(); \
00067             while(p__ != pe__) { \
00068                 Value value = (*p__).second; \
00069                 ++p__; \
00070                 // need to close with two extra }}

00072 #endif // nrnhash_h
